title: 2025 Was a Record Year for Activism: Barclays
description: Jim Rossman, global head of shareholder advisory at Barclays Capital, says 2025 set a record with 255 activist campaigns. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that M&A demands were the top focus of these activists. (Source: Bloomberg)
